panels.description: Current state of the train controller.
panels.title: Controller State

panels.description: Time taken by the controller for worker group operations.

targets.legendFormat: Run Name: {{ray_train_run_name}}, Worker Group Start Time
Run Name: {{ray_train_run_name}}, Worker Group Shutdown Time

panels.title: Controller Operation Time

panels.description: Time taken to report a checkpoint to storage.
panels.title: Checkpoint Report Time

panels.description: CPU core utilization across all workers.

targets.expr: sum(ray_node_cpu_utilization{instance=~"$Instance", RayNodeType=~"$RayNodeType", SessionName=~"$SessionName"} * ray_node_cpu_count{instance=~"$Instance", RayNodeType=~"$RayNodeType", SessionName=~"$SessionName"} / 100) by (instance, RayNodeType)

panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Total physical memory used vs total available memory.
panels.title: Total Memory Usage

panels.description: Memory allocation details including available and shared memory.
panels.title: Memory Allocation Details

targets.expr: sum(ray_node_gpus_utilization{instance=~"$Instance", RayNodeType=~"$RayNodeType", GpuIndex=~"$GpuIndex", GpuDeviceName=~"$GpuDeviceName", SessionName=~"$SessionName"} / 100) by (instance, RayNodeType, GpuIndex, GpuDeviceName)

panels.description: GPU memory usage across all workers.

targets.expr: sum(ray_node_gram_used{instance=~"$Instance", RayNodeType=~"$RayNodeType", GpuIndex=~"$GpuIndex", GpuDeviceName=~"$GpuDeviceName", SessionName=~"$SessionName"} * 1024 * 1024) by (instance, RayNodeType, GpuIndex, GpuDeviceName)

(sum(ray_node_gram_available{instance=~"$Instance", RayNodeType=~"$RayNodeType", GpuIndex=~"$GpuIndex", GpuDeviceName=~"$GpuDeviceName", SessionName=~"$SessionName"}) + sum(ray_node_gram_used{instance=~"$Instance", RayNodeType=~"$RayNodeType", GpuIndex=~"$GpuIndex", GpuDeviceName=~"$GpuDeviceName", SessionName=~"$SessionName"})) * 1024 * 1024

panels.title: GPU Memory Usage

panels.description: Disk space usage across all workers.
panels.title: Disk Space Usage

panels.description: Current disk read/write operations per second.
panels.title: Disk Operations
